ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This project was supported by the Grant no. 17-06763S of the Grant Agency of the Czech Republic. We would like to thank our collaborators who helped us in the field (Spyros Tsiftsis, Michal Pultr, Marcela Habinová and Pavla Staňková) and with the determination of aphid predators and other insects (Alois Honěk). We also thank to the South Bohemian Branch of the Land Office in České Budějovice for logistic help.
